ArgonTest.Name: Ensures return value function fail
ArgonTest.InputSource:
module _
import Argon.Core::*
sealed trait IsEven (n: Int) <: Object end
class ZeroIsEven <: IsEven 0 public def new() end end
def getEvenValue: Int ensures IsEven @ do 0 end
proc printEven(n: Int) (requires erased even: IsEven n): () = puts (n.to_s())
proc main(): () do let n = getEvenValue printEven n end
